mapper.sql: id, name, type, date_insert, date_update, delete_mark
mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id,name AS name,CASE type WHEN 0 THEN '管理' WHEN 1 THEN '木工' WHEN 2 THEN '瓦工' WHEN 3 THEN '油工' WHEN 4 THEN '电工' WHEN 5 THEN '小工' WHEN 6 THEN '抹灰工' END AS typeName, type AS type,DATE_FORMAT(date_insert,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS dateInsert FROM employee WHERE delete_mark = 0
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{params.name},'%')
AND type = #{type}
ORDER BY date_insert DESC
